Class.ClassComment: TransactionTable /** * Interface that allows to fetch the {@link org.infinispan.transaction.xa.GlobalTransaction} associated to local orremote transactions. * @author Pedro Ruivo * @since 7.1 */

Method.MethodComment: /** * @param transaction the local transaction. Must be non-null. * @return the {@link org.infinispan.transaction.xa.GlobalTransaction} associated with the transaction or {@code null} if doesn't exists. */
